title: Fitna the movie - English - AVI and FLV format
description:
Fitna the movie, in English this time

File list:

Fitna-English.flv (original file)
Fitna-English(converted file, so you don&#039;t need flvplayer)
readme.txt (tribute to TPB)

As found on http://www.liveleak.com/view?i=7d9_1206624103

Thanks to folks on IRC for providing me with a mirror :D

I&#039;ve converted it from flv to avi with ffmpeg: ffmpeg -i Fitna-English.flv Fitna-English.avi

Download ffmpeg from http://ffdshow.faireal.net/mirror/ffmpeg/ (win32 binary + dll)
